translations: 人道主义的，博爱的；基督凡人论的
人道主义者，博爱者；慈善家；基督凡人论者

sentences.sentence: Humanitarian work comes naturally to them.
sentences.translation: 人道主义工作对他们而言轻而易举。

sentences.sentence: Japan has pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid.
sentences.translation: 日本已承诺提供一亿元人道主义援助。

sentences.sentence: Even as a humanitarian mission it has been only a qualified success.
sentences.translation: 即使是一项人道主义任务，也只是局部成功。
